event.title: FSFE in Italy, talk at MERGE-it 2023 in Verona, Italy

body.p: Marta Andreoli, FSFE Deputy Coordinator Italy will participate in MERGE-it 2023, in Verona, Italy. She will do a brief overview of FSFE activities with a focus on the Italian community. The talk will take place on May 12 at 11:30.
